content: across single_crochet in each st along the side single_crochet in each st across the top single_crochet in each st along the other side slip_stitch into beginning single_crochet draw elastic up till you have the desired size opening it doesn t have to be to snug as the head band will keep it from falling off tie two pieces of elastic together with a secure knot such as a square knot trim off excess leaving enough to weave in to hide ends sew snood to headband by sewing two single_crochet at the beginning of row 1 of snood to bottom 2 single_crochet on the bone ring be sure right side is facing out end off sew two single_crochet at the end of row 1 of snood to bottom 2 single_crochet on the bone ring at opposite end of head band again make sure right side is facing out end off finishing sew rose onto the bone ring if you so desire sew 8 beads across the top of snood spaced evenly apart rose the rose is made with same crochet thread you used through out the rest of the snood to tie it all together use the proper size hook to the proper size thread round 1 chain 6 slip_stitch to form ring 12 single_crochet in ring slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet round 2 chain 1 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet * chain 4 skip next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat from * to * 5 more times ending with sl st in 1st single_crochet 6 chain 4 lps round 3 slip_stitch into chain 4 lp chain 1 * 1 single_crochet 5 double_crochet 1 single_crochet all in the same lp * repeat from * to * in each lp around ending with slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet six petals round 4 working behind the petals just finished work a single_crochet in single_crochet that forms the petal joining *chain 5 single_crochet in next single_crochet joining * repeat from * to * 5 more times ending with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 6 chain 5 lps behind first set of petals round 5 slip_stitch into chain 5 lp chain 1 * 1 single_crochet 7 double_crochet 1 single_crochet all in the same lp * repeat from * to * in each lp around ending with slip_stitch into 1st single_crochet six petals round 6 working behind the petals just finished work a single_crochet in single_crochet that forms the petal joining *chain 6 single_crochet in next single_crochet joining * repeat from * to * 7 more times ending with slip_stitch in 1st single_crochet 6 chain 6 lps behind next set of petals round 7 slip_stitch into chain lp chain 1 * 1 single_crochet 9 double_crochet 1 single_crochet all in the same lp * repeat from * to * in each lp around ending
